title: Who was St Edmund the Martyr and why do we remember him?

title: Today in History: November 18, Robert Blake ordered to pay $30 million in wife’s slaying
description: Eight months after Robert Blake was acquitted of murdering his wife at a criminal trial, a civil jury decided the actor was behind the killing and ordered him to pay $30 million to Bonny Lee Bakley’s children.
